anya-e0801n5:1_0: 1. Tija mānehi kha sā khamā vīmaṁsāsu.
anya-e0801n5:2_0: Khantiyaṁ tijā vīmaṁsāyaṁ mānā ca khasappaccayā honti yathākkamaṁ, titikkhā, vīmaṁsā,
anya-e0801n5:2_3: Khamāvīmaṁsā, sūti kiṁ? Tejanaṁ, tejo, tejayati, mānanaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:4_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti. Tikicchā,
anya-e0801n5:4_4: Aññatra niketo, saṁketo, ketanaṁ, keto, ketayati.
anya-e0801n5:5_0: 3. Nindāyaṁ gupa badhā bassa bho ca.
anya-e0801n5:6_0: Nindāyaṁ vattamānehi gupa badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca. Jigucchā,
anya-e0801n5:8_0: Tumantato icchāyamatthe te khasachā honti bahulaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:8_13: Yathā kūlaṁ patitu micchatīti vākyaṁ hoti,
anya-e0801n5:10_6: na hi aññamapekkhamāno aññena sahekatthibhāvamanubhavituṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0801n5:10_7: Idhāpi carahi na siyā ‘attano putta micchatī’ti?
anya-e0801n5:14_0: Ādhāratū-pamānā ācāratthe īyo yoti. Kuṭiyamivā-carati kuṭīyatī pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṁ bhikkhu.
anya-e0801n5:16_0: Kattutū-pamānā ācāratthe āyo hoti. Pabbato ivācarati pabbatāyati.
anya-e0801n5:20_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṁ atthe āyo hoti. Saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.
anya-e0801n5:22_0: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṁ atthe asso hoti. Namassati tathāgtaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:26_0: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti. Saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti, sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
anya-e0801n5:28_0: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā. Kriyā attho yassa so kriyattho dhātu.
anya-e0801n5:30_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:32_1: tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṁ, kāreti, kārāpeti.
anya-e0801n5:32_2: Nanu ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṁ payojakoti taṁbyāpārepi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti?
anya-e0801n5:32_3: Payojakaggahaṇasāmatthiyā na bhavissanti curādīhi visuṁ vacanasāmatthiyā ca.
anya-e0801n5:33_2: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu mānantatyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā.
anya-e0801n5:33_15: Apica ete kyādayo tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattukammabhāva vihitesu kyalādīnaṁ vidhānato tesveva viññāyantīti akammakehi dhātūhi kattubhāvesu,
anya-e0801n5:35_0: Kriyatthato aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna ntatyādīsu lo hoti. Lakāro,
anya-e0801n5:37_0: Rudhādito kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti maṁ ca antasarā paro.
anya-e0801n5:39_0: Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi kattuvihitamānanta tyādīsu lo hoti vibhāsā, orayanto, corento,
anya-e0801n5:41_0: Divādīhi lavisaye yaka hoti. Dibbanto, dibbati.
anya-e0801n5:43_0: Tudādīhi lavisaye ko hoti. Tudamāno, tudanto, tudati.
anya-e0801n5:45_0: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti. Jinanto, jināti. Kathaṁ ‘jayanto’ jayatī, ti? Bhūvādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n5:47_0: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. Kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
anya-e0801n5:49_0: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti. Kathaṁ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n5:53_0: Tabbaanīyā kriyatthā pare bhāvakammesu bahulaṁ bhavanti.
anya-e0801n5:55_0: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṁ. Vākyaṁ, kāriyaṁ, ceyyaṁ, jeyyaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:57_0: Ātoghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu, āssa e ca. Deyyaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:59_0: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulaṁ bhāvakammesu. Vajjaṁ, majjaṁ, gammaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:63_0: Gutādīhi kriyattehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti. Guyhaṁ, duyhaṁ, sisso.
anya-e0801n5:63_1: Siddhā evete tabbādayo pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññenavidhānato,
anya-e0801n5:63_2: tvayā khalu kaṭo kattabbo, karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco,
anya-e0801n5:63_6: Evaṁ uddhamohuttikepi vattamānato pesādīsu siddhā eva.
anya-e0801n5:63_7: Tathā arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe ca bhāvādo siddhā,
anya-e0801n5:65_0: Kattari kārake kriyatthā ltuṇakā honti bahulaṁ. Paṭhitā, pāṭhako.
anya-e0801n5:69_0: Āsiṁsāyaṁ gamyamānāyaṁ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n5:71_0: Karato kattari ṇano hoti. Karotīti kāraṇaṁ, kattarīti kiṁ? Karaṇaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:73_0: Hāto vīhismiṁ kāle ca ṇano hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n5:75_0: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari. Vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e0801n5:77_0: Vipubbā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Viññū. Vitoti kiṁ? Paññā.
anya-e0801n5:79_0: Kammato parā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari. Sabbaññū, kālaññū.
anya-e0801n5:81_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari.
anya-e0801n5:81_3: bahulādhikārā idha na hoti ādiccaṁ passati,
anya-e0801n5:83_0: Kammato parā gamā rū hoti kattari. Vedagū pāragū.
anya-e0801n5:84_0: 43. Samānañña bhavanta yāditū-pamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā.
anya-e0801n5:85_0: Samānādīhi yādīhi copamānehi parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti.
anya-e0801n5:85_1: Samāno viya dissatīti sadī sadikkho sadiso.
anya-e0801n5:87_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:87_1: A-paggaho, niggaho, karo, garo, cayo, jayo, ravo, bhavo, paco, vaco, annado,
anya-e0801n5:87_11: lābho laddho, gha-vako, nipako, ka-piyo, khipo, bhujo, āyudhaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:89_0: Dādhāhi bahulami hoti bhāvakārakesu. Ādi, nidhi, vālami.
anya-e0801n5:91_0: Vamādīhi bhāvakārakesvathu hoti. Vamathu, vepathu, (avathu, sayathu).
anya-e0801n5:95_2: adhikaraṇaṁ, calano, jalano, kodhano, kopano, maṇḍano, bhūsano.
anya-e0801n5:96_0: 49. Itthiyamaṇa tti ka yaka yā ca.
anya-e0801n5:97_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honti ano ca bahulaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:97_2: puttiyā īhā bhikkhā, āpadā, medhā, godhā, ṇakārā, hārā, tārā, dhārā, ārā,
anya-e0801n5:101_0: Karato ririyo hotitthiyaṁ. Karaṇaṁ kiriyā. Kathaṁ ‘kriyā’ti? “Kriyāyaṁ”ti nipātanā.
anya-e0801n5:103_0: Kriyatthassa sarūpe-bhidheyye kriyatthā pare ikitī honti, vaci, yudhi, pacati,
anya-e0801n5:105_0: Kriyatthā ṇī hoti sīlādīsu patīyamānesu, uṇhabhojī, khīrapāyī, avassakārī, satandāyī.
anya-e0801n5:109_0: Bhūte-tthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantuttāvī honti kattari. Vijitavā, vijitāvī,
anya-e0801n5:111_0: Bhāve kamme ca bhūte kto hoti. Āsitaṁ bhavatā. Kato kaṭo bhavatā.
anya-e0801n5:114_0: 58. Ṭhā-sa vasa silisa sī ruha jara janīhi.
anya-e0801n5:117_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca,
anya-e0801n5:117_8: ‘devo ce vuṭṭho sampannā sālayo’ti kāraṇasāmaggīsampatti etthābhimatā.
anya-e0801n5:119_15: evaṁ sīlito, rakkhito, khanto, ākuṭṭho, ruṭṭho, rusito,
anya-e0801n5:119_16: abhibyāhaṭo, dayiyo, haṭṭho, kantā, saṁyato, amato,
anya-e0801n5:120_0: 61. Tuṁ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṁ tadatthāya.
anya-e0801n5:121_0: Bhavissati atthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve tuṁ tāye tave honti kriyāyaṁ tadatthāyaṁ patīyamānāyaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:121_4: icchati bhottuṁ kāmeti bhottunti imīnāva siddhaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:123_0: Alaṁ khalusaddānaṁ paṭisedhatthānaṁ payoge tunādayo vā honti bhāve.
anya-e0801n5:125_8: ‘Appatvā nadiṁ pabbato atikkamma pabbataṁ nadī’ti bhūdhātussa sabbattha sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate.
anya-e0801n5:125_9: ‘Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti’ imināva siddhaṁ ābhikkhaññantu dvibbacanāvagamyate.
anya-e0801n5:127_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyattā nto ho ti kattari, tiṭṭhanto.
anya-e0801n5:129_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā māno hoti, kattari. Tiṭṭhamāno.
anya-e0801n5:131_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriṁyatthā bhāve kammeca māno hoti. Ṭhīyamānaṁ, paccamāno odano.
anya-e0801n5:133_0: Anāgatatthe vattamānato kriyatthā tentamānā ssapubbā honti.
anya-e0801n5:135_0: Kriyatthā pare bahulaṁ ṇvādayo honti. Cāru, dāru.
anya-e0801n5:137_0: Khachasappaccayantānaṁ kriyatthānaṁ paṭhamekassaraṁ saddarūpaṁ dve bhavati. Titikkhā, jigucchā, vīmaṁsā.
anya-e0801n5:139_0: Parokkhāyaṁ paṭhamekassaraṁ saddarūpaṁ dve bhavati. Jagāma,
anya-e0801n5:141_0: Ādibhūtā sarā paramekassaraṁ dve hoti, asisisati, ādismāti kiṁ? Jajagāra, sarāti kiṁ? Papāca.
anya-e0801n5:143_0: Yaṁ dvibhūtaṁ, na taṁ puna dvittamāpajjate, titikkhisati, jigucchisati.
anya-e0801n5:147_0: Dvitte pubbassa saro rasso hoti. Dadāti.
anya-e0801n5:149_0: Dvitte pubbassādito-ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti. Asisisati.
anya-e0801n5:151_0: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu. Pipāsati,
anya-e0801n5:153_0: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu, jigucchati.
anya-e0801n5:155_0: Dvitte pubesaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā honti. Bubhukkhati, ciccheda.
anya-e0801n5:157_0: Dvitte pubbesaṁ kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā honti yathākkamaṁ. Cukopa, jahāti.
anya-e0801n5:159_0: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti parassa ca maṁ, vīmaṁsati.
anya-e0801n5:161_0: Saṁsayaso-ññasmiṁ vattamānassa dvitte pubbassa kitassa vā ti hoti.
anya-e0801n5:163_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṁ kriyatthānaṁ eohonti yathākkamaṁ paccaye. Cetabbaṁ, netabbaṁ, sotabbaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:165_0: Lahubhūtassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa eo honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:167_0: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti. Kārako.
anya-e0801n5:169_0: Te eoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti. Cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho,
anya-e0801n5:169_14: pīnayituṁ, pīnanaṁ, pīnituṁ, pīnayati, sunoti, sinoti, dunoti, hinoti,
anya-e0801n5:171_0: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu. Mudito, ruditaṁ, roditaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:173_0: Kānubandhanāgamato-ññasmimpi te kvaci, nu honti. Khipako, panūdanaṁ, vadhako.
anya-e0801n5:177_0: Sare pare eonaṁ ayaavā honti. Jayo, bhavo, sarati kiṁ? Jeti, anubhoti.
anya-e0801n5:179_0: Eonaṁ āyāvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe. Nāyayati, bhāvayati, ‘sayāpetvā’tiādīsu rassattaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:181_0: Ākārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇāpito-ññasmiṁ ṇānubandhe. Dāyako,
anya-e0801n5:185_0: Rudhādīnaṁ kvaci maṁ vā hoti. Rundhituṁ, rujjhituṁ, kvacitveva? Nirodho.
anya-e0801n5:187_0: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvimhi. Bhattaṁ gasanti gaṇhanti vā etthāti bhattaggaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:191_0: Makāranakārantānaṁ kriyatthānaṁ niggahītaṁ hoti ayakāre byañjane.
anya-e0801n5:193_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūmi, byañjanetveva? Abravi.
anya-e0801n5:195_0: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṁ kriyatthānaṁ kagā honti yathākkamaṁ. Vākyaṁ, bhāgyaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:199_0: Payyādīhi parassa hanassa gho hoti kvimhi. Paligho, paṭigho, aghaṁ rassattaṁ nipātanā, saṅgho, ogho.
anya-e0801n5:201_0: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṁ hoti se. Jighaṁsā.
anya-e0801n5:203_0: Dvitte paresaṁ jitarānaṁ gī hoti se. Vijigīsā, jigīsā.
anya-e0801n5:205_0: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti. Dahati.
anya-e0801n5:207_0: Dusassa dīgho hoti ṇimhi. Dusito. Ṇimhīti kiṁ? Duṭṭho.
anya-e0801n5:209_0: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare. Nigūhanaṁ sareti kiṁ? Guyhaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:211_0: Muhabahānaṁ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite, mūḷho, bāḷho, gūḷho, teti kiṁ? Muyhati,
anya-e0801n5:213_0: Vahassa ussa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Vuṭṭho.
anya-e0801n5:215_0: Dhā=dhāraṇetīmassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Nihito, nihitavā.
anya-e0801n5:217_0: Gamādīnaṁ rakārantānaṁ ca antassa lopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite. Gato, khato, hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato, tetveva? Gamyate,
anya-e0801n5:219_0: Vacādīnaṁ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe-tve. Uttaṁ, vuttaṁ, uṭṭhaṁ, vuṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:221_0: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe-sve. Vuttaṁ, vuṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:223_0: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe tve. Vuddho. Vaddho.
anya-e0801n5:225_0: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī honti kānubandhe-tve. Iṭṭhaṁ, yiṭṭhaṁ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
anya-e0801n5:227_0: Ṭhāssi hoti kānubandhe-tve. Ṭhito, atvetveva? Ṭhatvāna, ṭhatvā.
anya-e0801n5:231_0: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
anya-e0801n5:233_0: Sāsassa sisa vā hoti kānubandhe-tve. Siṭṭhaṁ, satthaṁ, sisso, sāsiyo atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
anya-e0801n5:237_0: Tumādīsu vā karassā hoti. Kātuṁ kattuṁ, kātuna kattuna, kātabbaṁ kattabbaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:239_0: Ñādhātussa jā hoti nakāre. Jānituṁ, jānanto, neti kiṁ? Ñāto.
anya-e0801n5:241_3: sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti, ṇeti kiṁ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
anya-e0801n5:243_0: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti. Nicchayo.
anya-e0801n5:245_0: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā. Jīraṇaṁ, jīrati, jīrāpeti,
anya-e0801n5:245_3: nisīdituṁ, nisīdati, vāti kiṁ? Jarā, nisajjā,
anya-e0801n5:246_0: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
anya-e0801n5:247_6: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṁ, duddaso, addasa, addā, addaṁ, addakkhi,
anya-e0801n5:249_0: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīvikkhakesu. Sarī, sadī, sarikkho, sadikkho, sariso, sadiso.
anya-e0801n5:251_0: Dahassa dassa ḍo hoti vā. Ḍāho, dāho, ḍahati, dahati.
anya-e0801n5:253_0: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hoti anaghaṇasu. Āḷahanaṁ, pariḷāho.
anya-e0801n5:255_3: etena katthaci kassaci dhātussa appayogāpi ñāpito hoti.
anya-e0801n5:257_0: Aādo, āādo, ssādo ca atthissa bhū hoti. Babhūva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
anya-e0801n5:258_2: Ntādisūtthissādilopo hoti. Santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṁ,
anya-e0801n5:260_0: Pādīhi kiriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti.
anya-e0801n5:260_4: Pa parā apa saṁ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api atisu u abhi pati pari upa ā pādī.
anya-e0801n5:262_0: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci. Anādiyitvā, samādiyati, kvacitveva? Ādāya.
anya-e0801n5:264_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Saṅkhāro,
anya-e0801n5:264_2: karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṁ timhi ca vikaraṇuppattiñāpetuṁ.
anya-e0801n5:266_0: Purā iccasmā nipātā parassa karassa kha hoti. Purakkhatvā, purekkhāro-ettaṁ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e0801n5:268_0: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti, nikkhamati, kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
anya-e0801n5:270_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇattānaṁ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅa hoti sare kvaci. Vediyati, bruvanti,
anya-e0801n5:272_0: Ñādito-ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Dīyati, aññādissāti kiṁ? Ñāyati, tāyatiṁ.
anya-e0801n5:274_0: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye. Tāyate, taññate.
anya-e0801n5:276_0: Sarantassa kriyatthassa dīgho hoti kye, cīyate, sūyate.
anya-e0801n5:278_0: Sakārantato kriyatthā parassā-nantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Tuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā,
anya-e0801n5:280_0: Kasasmā parassānantarassa tassa ṭha hoti kasassa vā ima ca. Kiṭṭhaṁ, kaṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:284_0: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassa ṭha hoti. Puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho,
anya-e0801n5:286_0: Etehi parassānantarassa tassa tha hoti, satthaṁ, vatthaṁ,
anya-e0801n5:288_0: Dhakārahakārabhakārantehi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa tassa dha hoti. Vuddho, duddhaṁ, laddhaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:290_0: Dahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍha hoti. Daḍḍho.
anya-e0801n5:292_0: Bahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍho hoti, bahassuma ca ḍhasanniyogena. Buḍḍho.
anya-e0801n5:294_0: Rahādīhi parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti ḷo cāntassa. Āruḷho, gūḷho, vūḷho, bāḷho, (ogāḷho),
anya-e0801n5:296_0: Muhā parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti vā ḷo cāntassa hasanniyogena. Mūḷho, muddho.
anya-e0801n5:298_0: Bhidādito paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa no hoti.
anya-e0801n5:298_13: ktaktavantūnanti kiṁ? Bhitti, chitti, bhettuṁ, chettuṁ.
anya-e0801n5:300_0: Dāto paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa inno hoti. Dinno, dinnavā.
anya-e0801n5:302_0: Kirādīhi paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassānantarassa ṇa hoti,
anya-e0801n5:304_0: Tarādīhi paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa riṇṇo hoti. Tiṇṇo tiṇṇavā, jiṇṇo jiṇṇavā, ciṇṇo ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0801n5:306_0: Bhanjādīhi paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassānantarassa ga hoti.
anya-e0801n5:308_0: Susā paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa kho hoti. Sukkho sukkhavā.
anya-e0801n5:310_0: Pacā paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa ko hoti. Pakko pakkavā.
anya-e0801n5:312_0: Mucā paresaṁ ktaktavantūnaṁ tassa ko vā hoti.
anya-e0801n5:314_0: Vaḍḍhā parassa ktissa tassa lopo hoti. Vaḍḍhi.
anya-e0801n5:316_0: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti, abhibhū.
anya-e0801n5:318_0: Ṇiṇāpīnaṁ lopo hoti tesu ṇiṇāpīsu. Kārentaṁ payojayati kāreti kārāpayati.
anya-e0801n5:320_0: Vikaraṇānaṁ kvaci lopo hoti. Udapādi, hanti.
anya-e0801n5:322_0: Kriyatthā parassa mānassa makārassa lopo hoti kvaci. Karāṇo, kvacīti kiṁ? Kurumāno.
anya-e0801n5:324_0: Ñilāname hoti kvaci. Gahetvā, adenti, kvacitveva? Vapitvā.
anya-e0801n5:328_0: Ktvāssa vā tuṁyānā honti samāse kvacci.
anya-e0801n5:330_0: Hanasmā parassa ktvāssa racco vā hoti samāse. Āhacca, āhanitvā.
anya-e0801n5:332_0: Sāsādhīhi parā karā parassa ktvassa cacariccā honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:334_0: Iiccasmā parassa ktvāssa cco vā hoti. Adhicca adhīyitvā, samecca sametvā.
anya-e0801n5:336_0: Disato ktvāssa vānavā honti vā disassa ca sa kāro taṁsanniyogena.
anya-e0801n5:338_0: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti. Bhuñjituṁ bhottuṁ, byañjanassāti kiṁ? Pācako.
anya-e0801n5:340_0: Rantato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti. Araṇaṁ, saraṇaṁ.
anya-e0801n5:342_0: Rantato paresaṁ ntamānatyādīnaṁ nassa ṇo na hoti, karonto, kurumāno, karonti.
anya-e0801n5:344_3: icchanto icchamāno icchati acchanto acchamāno acchati,
anya-e0801n5:348_2: tiṭṭhamāno, tiṭṭhati, pivanto, pivamāno, pivati, vātvevi? Ṭhāti, pāti.
anya-e0801n5:352_0: Karassa saokārassa kubbādayo vā honti ntamānatyādīsu.
anya-e0801n5:354_0: Gahassa vā gheppo hoti ntamānatyādīsu. Gheppanto, gheppamāno, gheppati, vātveva? Gaṇhati.
anya-e0801n5:356_0: Gahassa niggahītassa ṇo hoti. Gaṇhitabbaṁ, gaṇhituṁ, gaṇhanto.
